tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WaterSavingInitiatives (
    initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_name TEXT,
    initiative_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    completion_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE initiatives (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE results (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_id INT,
  result_description TEXT,
  result_date DATE,
  result_value FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES initiatives(id)
);

CREATE TABLE water_saving_initiatives (
    initiative_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    building_id UUID NOT NULL,
    initiative_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE buildings (
    building_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    building_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(200),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(50),
    zip_code VARCHAR(10),
    country VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE initiative_results (
    result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_id UUID NOT NULL,
    water_saved DECIMAL(10, 2),
    energy_saved DECIMAL(10, 2),
    cost_saved DECIMAL(10, 2),
    result_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE initiatives (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE buildings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(50),
    zip_code VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_id INT,
    building_id INT,
    water_saved DECIMAL(10, 2),
    energy_saved DECIMAL(10, 2),
    cost_saved DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE facilities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    manager VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Buildings (
    building_id INT NOT NULL,
    building_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    city VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    state VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (building_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WaterSavingInitiatives (
    initiative_id INT NOT NULL,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    building_id INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (initiative_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES Buildings(building_id)
);

CREATE TABLE InitiativeResults (
    result_id INT NOT NULL,
    initiative_id INT NOT NULL,
    result_value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    result_date DATE NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (result_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES WaterSavingInitiatives(initiative_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumption (
    building_id INT NOT NULL,
    month_year DATE NOT NULL,
    energy_usage DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (building_id, month_year),
    FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES Buildings(building_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WaterUsage (
    building_id INT NOT NULL,
    month_year DATE NOT NULL,
    water_usage DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (building_id, month_year),
    FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES Buildings(building_id)
);
